title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1337/95 of 13 June 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3901/92 introducing detailed rules for granting carryover aid on certain fishery products
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1337/95 of 13 June 1995 amending  Regulation (EEC) No 3901/92 introducing detailed rules for granting carryover aid on certain  fishery products (Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 3901/92 is hereby replaced by the  Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in  the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 June 1995.
For the Commission Emma BONINO Member of the Commission
ANNEX
